attributes.action: Call an immediate general election in order to allow the public to decide the fate of MPs in view of their expenses debacle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A different set of principles and laws appear to seperate MPs and the public and many MPs appear to have behaved in an abhorrent manner. Worse, no heads have rolled, nor prosecutions been initiated.

A general election would allow the public to put the house in order.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
